SAFE Exit Act of 2026
Securing Accessible Funtional Emergency Exit Act of 2026

To amend title 49, United States Code, to require each new motor vehicle to be equipped with a manual door release allowing timely exit regardless of failure of any electrical system, and for other purposes.
